attributes.action: reinstate Professor David Nutt as chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 30th December, Home Secretary Alan Johnson sacked Professor Nutt for his "recent comments that have received so much media attention."

We the undersigned live in a free country where we expect government advisors to be allowed to voice criticism of our Ministers without fear of losing their jobs. We believe that the value of a transparent, accountable government in which true debate can be heard outweighs ministers' concerns about their own image or how the debate is presented to the public.

This petition is founded on the principles of Free Speech and has nothing to do with whether or not Professor Nutt's opinions are correct.
